name: Lasertron
description: Lasertron is a unique robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its oscilloscope-themed design, featuring a classic box-shaped body, soldier-grade arms and legs, and a laser-equipped screen, Lasertron is a formidable and technologically advanced creation. It combines the precision of an oscilloscope with the strength of a soldier, making it a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
